title: Drawing, "Design for a Candle Bracket", ca. 1740
medium: Pen and ink, brush and wash on laid paper
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Left, incomplete, side elevation; right, front elevation. The shaft is attached to, and arises from, a convex panel. The shaft itself, consisting of rocaille motifs, and of a dragon supports a scaffolding with two candles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Candle Bracket", ca. 1740.
ca. 1740. Pen and ink, brush and wash on laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1908-26-129.
